analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol:
	Contract TokenFaucet has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#507-512)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenFaucet._distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#652-678):
	External calls:
	- _token.transfer(account,_dailyRate) (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _referralList (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol)
	- _totalDistributedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol)

TokenRecover.recoverERC20 (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#422-429) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(owner(),tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#427-429)

TokenFaucet._distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#652-678) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(account,_dailyRate) (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol)
	-_token.transfer(firstReferral,referralEarnedTokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol)

TokenFaucet._distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#652-678) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(nextClaimTime(account) <= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/1/0x87d9ef8951de64b7246fdb7c7d5a52760677f361.sol#653-655)
